name: Therapy (xanok)
description:
Therapy is a short story adventure that the player takes on the viewpoint of someone dealing with Tragedy but isnt able to find the necessary help since the healthcare system is neglected for Psichatric health. Undergo the 5 stages of grief to truly find peace within your own mind

Will you wallow within the dark recesses of your mind

or seek the help needed for your mental health.

Collect the paintings that are but simple reflections of yourself to find the light you need.
